thread.section_title: The Bowery Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The perfect city hotel
thread.title_full: The perfect city hotel - Review of The Bowery Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Peter Å
title: The perfect city hotel
text:
It doesn´t get any better than this. The charm of this hotel with its classic ambience and history kept intact is what does this to the best hotel in NY. Personal, friendly, interesting and very proffessional. The hotel is just right in size for great random meetings with all kinds of poeple that knows how to pick those spots. You feel that this is your second home, that you want to stay in the bar or the lounge to see who the next interesting person to enter the door. This is New York at its best.
Staff, service food is of course is fantastic and their shoshine teh best in the world - try it.
